short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best LinkedIn Connection Organizer. Add notes, tag connections, and filter your network. Never lose track of how you met contacts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn Jet helps you organize and manage your professional network effectively.

Key Features:
• Add personal notes to your connections - Keep track of where and how you met, conversation details, or follow-up reminders
• Tag your connections - Create custom tags like "Client", "Colleague", "Conference 2024", or any category that matters to you
• Filter your network - Quickly find connections using your custom tags
• All data stays local - Your notes and tags are stored privately in your browser

Perfect for:
• Networking professionals
• Job seekers tracking their application contacts
• Sales professionals managing relationships
• Recruiters organizing candidates
• Anyone wanting to maintain meaningful professional connections

How it works:
1. Visit your LinkedIn connections page
2. Add notes and tags to any connection
3. Use the filter to find specific groups of connections
4. Your notes and tags are saved automatically

Privacy & Security:
• All data is stored locally in your browser
• No data is sent to external servers
• Works directly on LinkedIn's website
• Requires minimal permissions

Make the most of your professional network with LinkedIn Jet - the smart way to organize your connections.
